credit_line: Gift of The Museum at The Fashion Institute of Technology
title: Travelogue
description: Brightly colored illustrations of national monuments and tourist attractions. The sites include Statue of Liberty, Eiffel Tower, the Sphinx, cable car in San Francisco, the Great Pyramid and the Leaning Tower of Pisa. Printed in pink, blue, green and yellow on glossy black ground.
